Commands.Name: Backup Active Sheet
Commands.Description: Make a copy of the active sheet with " (Backup)" added to the sheet name.

Commands.Name: Backup All Sheets
Commands.Description: Make a copy of all sheets with " (Backup)" added to each sheet name.

Commands.Name: Goto Similar Background Color
Commands.Description: Select cells in selection with same background color as active cell.

Commands.Name: Goto Similar Constant Values
Commands.Description: Select constant cells in selection with similar value as active cell.

Commands.Name: Goto Similar Formulas
Commands.Description: Select formula cells in selection with similar formula as active cell.

Commands.Name: Name Used Ranges On All Sheets
Commands.Description: Names the used range on each sheet in the workbook using a sanitized version of the sheet name.

Commands.Name: Paste Count By Background Color
Commands.Description: Pastes the count of cells in copied range by background color.

Commands.Name: Paste Formulas Over Similar Background Colors
Commands.Description: Paste the formulas in the copied cells over all similar background colors on the sheet as the selected cells.

Commands.Name: Paste Sum By Background Color
Commands.Description: Pastes the sum of cells in copied range by background color.

Commands.Name: Paste Values Over Similar Background Colors
Commands.Description: Paste the values in the copied cells over all similar background colors on the sheet as the selected cells.

Commands.Name: Save Game Answer To Left
Commands.Description: Saves references to the selected cells in the green answer cells to the left on the same row.
